name: 100 Hidden Kooky - Sand & Sun
description:
Search for hidden characters with unusual and silly behaviors in a hand-drawn, interactive scene set at the beach. These kooky characters are cleverly concealed in plain sight among others. Additionally, there are a few mini-games to challenge you and earn credits that will aid in discovering the kooky characters. To complete the game, you also have to find all 100 sunscreen bottles.

------/ Game Features /------
- Gameplay length = ~30 min
- 100+ targets to find
- Mini games available.
- Different color modes
- controller support
- 100 Achievements
